Uses of Package
elki.similarity.kernel

  • Packages that use elki.similarity.kernel 
    Package Description
    elki.outlier.anglebased
    Angle-based outlier detection algorithms.
    elki.similarity.kernel
    Kernel functions.
  • Classes in elki.similarity.kernel used by elki.outlier.anglebased 
    Class Description
    KernelMatrix
    Kernel matrix representation.
  • Classes in elki.similarity.kernel used by elki.similarity.kernel 
    Class Description
    KernelMatrix
    Kernel matrix representation.
    KernelMatrix.DBIDMap
    Map a DBID to its offset TODO: move to shared code.
    LaplaceKernel
    Laplace / exponential radial basis function kernel.
    LinearKernel
    Linear Kernel function that computes a similarity between the two feature vectors x and y defined by \(x^T\cdot y\).
    PolynomialKernel
    Polynomial Kernel function that computes a similarity between the two feature vectors x and y defined by \((x^T\cdot y+b)^{\text{degree}}\).
    RadialBasisFunctionKernel
    Gaussian radial basis function kernel (RBF Kernel).
    RationalQuadraticKernel
    Rational quadratic kernel, a less computational approximation of the Gaussian RBF kernel (RadialBasisFunctionKernel).
    SigmoidKernel
    Sigmoid kernel function (aka: hyperbolic tangent kernel, multilayer perceptron MLP kernel).
